xuong",-1),index:2},{image:atlas.findRegion("ngao xuong",-1),index:3},{image:atlas.findRegion("raucai xuong",-1),index:4},{image:atlas.findRegion("thitbo duration_food=0.05;var effect=atlas.findRegions("effect boc khoi");var tom_efftect=atlas.findRegions("Tom");var kimchi_efftect=atlas.findRegions("kimchi");var nam_efftect=atlas.findRegions("nam");var ngao_efftect=atlas.findRegions("ngao");var raucai_efftect=atlas.findRegions("raucai");var thitbo_efftect=atlas.findRegions("thitbo");var bachtuoc_effect=atlas.findRegions("bachtuoc");var smoke_animation=createAnimation(duration_smoke,effect);var
